history.content: make a 2 cm square on XY and extrude 1 cm

create a 2 cm by 2 cm square on XY at origin and extrude 1 cm new body

{"status": "planned", "assistant_message": "The plan is to create a square and then extrude it.", "questions": [], "plan": ["1. Extrude the last profile of 'sk_0' by 1 cm to create a new body."], "actions": [{"action": "create_sketch", "params": {"plane": "XY"}}, {"action": "add_rectangle", "params": {"sketch_id": "sk_0", "x1": 0, "y1": 0, "x2": 2, "y2": 2}}, {"action": "extrude_last_profile", "params": {"distance": 1, "operation": "NewBody"}}], "requires_confirmation": true}
on XY, draw a circle radius 0.5 cm at (1,1) and cut 0.2 cm
